option.name: wordpress_repo
option.description: This is the repo that conataiins the source code for this wordpress site.

option.name: dest_repo
option.description: This is the Dest repo containing the front end compiled files.

command.script: cd / sudo rm -rf @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo mkdir @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp is created. cd @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo downloading the project. sudo git clone --single-branch --branch @option.deployment_branch@ https://@option.wordpress_repo@ .

if [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "master" ] then sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo rm Jenkinsfile sudo rm README.md sudo rm -rf themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/* sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/ else sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo rm Jenkinsfile sudo rm README.md sudo rm -rf themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/* sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/ fi
echo the artifacts are copied to the destination. sudo rm -rf /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo the temp direcotry is removed.

cd / sudo rm -rf @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo mkdir @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp is created. cd @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo downloading the project. sudo git clone --single-branch --branch @option.deployment_branch@ https://@option.dest_repo@ .

if [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "master" ] then sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist/ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist else sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist/ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/wp-content/themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/dist fi
echo the artifacts are copied to the destination. sudo rm -rf /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo the temp direcotry is removed.
